body:
The way NAG versions its compilers is with a major.minor release and a separate build number. If I had to guess, I'd say the build number changed. This checksum is for:
```
$ nagfor -V
NAG Fortran Compiler Release 6.1(Tozai) Build 6120
Product NPL6A61NA for x86-64 Linux
Copyright 1990-2016 The Numerical Algorithms Group Ltd., Oxford, U.K.
```
title: Update NAG checksum, add F77 and FC
